message: Reach Iron Plate chest Level 2 to unlock (upgrade the chest when it is full)
Mine 10 Stone Ore to unlock (upgrade the chest when it is full)
Equip 2 Stone Furnace to the iron plate fire to unlock
Equip all 3 mines (iron, coal, stone) with at least a drill to unlock
Equip the Iron Plate with at least 2 Transport Belt for Iron Ore and 2 Transport Belt for Coal Ore to unlock (Transport Belts transfer resources automatically)
Equip the Iron Plate with at least 2 Inserters for Iron Ore and 2 Inserters for Coal Ore to unlock (Inserters transfer more resources with each click and transport belts)
Reach Assembling Machine chest Level 2 to unlock
